summary:
Renault is a French car company started in 1899. It makes cars, vans, and used to make trucks and buses. The headquarters are near Paris. Renault owns other brands like Alpine and Dacia. It is part of a big alliance with Nissan and Mitsubishi. The French government and Nissan each have a 15% share.

Renault is famous for its sports car racing and has won many rallies and Formula 1 races. It also helped with early computer graphics by modeling car bodies using math.
title: Renault
